moves.1. e4 c6 2. d4: I start with one of my favourite defences.
moves.5... Nc6 6. O-O e6 7. a3 Nf6 8. Nc3: As white I'd prefer c3 followed by Nd2 but I'd prefer no exchange variation in the caro kann at all!
moves.9. h3 O-O 10. Bb5 Rc8 11. Bg5 h6 12. Bh4: At this point I was thinking about supporting my d pawn to play d4 followed by Rxc2.
moves.16... a6 17. Bxd7 Qxd7 18. Kh1 Rc7 19. R: This part would just be boring with each move being one to avoid loss on timeout.
moves.21... Qc6 22. Kh2 Qd7 23. Kg3 Kf8 24. Qd: Blockades whites advance. My LSb will now be very powerful.
This is now completely winning for me after a4 since I have activity on the c file and my LSb is worth a lot.
moves.58... Rxf4+ 59. Ke3 Re4+: The game is over now. I will have an advantage of 3 pawns.
